entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as having swollen eyes, gouge marks on his face, and an unkempt appearance. He is also mentioned to be hugging Ron and Hermione with yells of delight.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being hugged by Neville along with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being hugged by Neville along with Ron.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned to be worse than Neville's injuries and is also referred to by Neville in the conversation.

entities.name: abertforth
entities.description: Aberforth is mentioned as being addressed by Neville and is also referred to as 'Ab'.

relationships.description: Neville hugs Ron with yells of delight.
Neville hugs Hermione along with Ron.
Neville compares his injuries to Seamus's, stating that Seamus is worse.
Neville addresses Aberforth in the conversation.
Neville informs Seamus that it is a matter of time before they come.
